structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Establishment Of Home Inspection Licensure Requirements; Applicant Qualifications

text.section: has successfully completed high school or its equivalent;
has successfully completed a board-approved training program;
has performed not less than 25 home inspections in the presence of a licensed home inspector;
has passed a written or electronic competency examination offered or approved by the board;
has an identified supervisor who is a person licensed in good standing in the commonwealth as a home inspector; and
has paid the appropriate fee, which shall be set by the secretary of administration and finance.
